Discovery Bank / AAA

Landing page for Discovery Bank - work for Breakline Digital

Refactored javascript widgets utipzed by Discover Bank / AAA landing pages to enable dynamic JSON-based configuration.

Modernized existing codebase to incorporate async / await fetching of bank product rates.

Implemented a namespacing solution to prevent CSS and javascript function collisions between dynamically loaded widgets.

Endangered Species

The Flatiron School final project:

Browse, comment, and connect to users with shared passion for conservation.

Developed REStful API using Ruby on Rails.

Built front-end with React.

Carefully selected all data used in the project and integrated Google Maps API.

Created expressive visual design incorporating CSS, Flexbox and MDBootstrap.
